Title: Requires pharmaceutical drug manufacturers and wholesalers to annually disclose all gifts to certain health care practitioners
Summary: Enacts the New York state pharmaceutical drug manufacturer and wholesaler disclosure act; requires pharmaceutical drug manufacturers and wholesalers to annually report to the New York department of health, for disclosure to the general public, all of its gifts to health care practitioners that prescribe drugs when such gifts have a value of seventy-five dollars or more; authorizes the commissioner of health to impose penalties and promulgate necessary rules and regulations.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title 3-A §§245 - 245-e, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to disclosure of certain gifts provided by drug manufacturers or wholesalers to health care providers
